Inputs.SubtitleText: Come in T.A.B.A, this is Lt. Com. Colton of the UEES Banshee
We better investigate. Stay close to me and keep your guard up, kid. EBs mean trouble
State your business in this part of the system
I'm picking up a Distress Beacon not too far from here, perhaps these guys had something to do with it
Looks like a convoy, but you never know. Standard protocol. I take the lead, you be ready in case things go tits up
I'm picking up a radar signal ahead. Activate your long range scanners
Next time, don't forget to do a long range scan
Good to see you Lt. Commander. We're transporting refugees out of the system
Times look pretty hard in the Odin system at the moment
Hold steady while we scan your cargo to verify your story
OK kid. Activate your scanners and let's check these guys out.
Come in Convoy. You are cleared to proceed.
Thanks Lt. Commander. Wish us luck
Come on Kid. Let's get out of here
Good job double checking the cargo back there. I appreciate your dilligence
Ok Kid. There's work to be done. Let's continue the patrol
